title: The Messiah Trinity
desc: It's Christmas at The Cathedral! So bring the entire family to celebrate this holiday spectacular in the one thousand seat Cathedral Arboretum. The first half of the concert will feature an all children's honor choir accompanied by orchestra. You'll hear a few new anthem's from the two hundred voice combined adult choir as well as your favorite sing along Christmas carols. Following intermission it's on to Handel's Masterpiece, The Messiah! This year we are pleased to welcome Orange County's Prima Donna, Mezzo Milena Kitic as a soloist. ?We'll introduce two new up and coming artists from Arizona Opera, Soprano Sarah Tucker and Bass Calvin Griffin while welcoming back Tenor Chad Berlinghieri. Taking the podium of the concert will be the young yet dynamic conductor from Mater Dei, Scott Melvin. Don't miss this annual extravaganza! ?The last two years have sold out "Hallelujah!" ?So please consider purchasing your tickets now!
